name: Lunch Box (18-card tabletop game)
description:
Lunch Box is an 18-card tabletop game, which you can print off and play.

Hi guys, welcome to the cooking class. Today, you'll be cooking your own lunch box. We've got all the ingredients here, grab this chance to treat yourself and stand out from all your classmates!

Game Design: Zhuo Zhu, Ya Gao
